title: It shouldn’t be this hard… - Alienware AW720H
description: Youll be amazed at what you can do with GrammarlyGO. Sign up at  and get 20% off Grammarly Premium.  Alienware is a meme on this channel for Plouffe's love of the AW3423DW monitor, but are their other products any good? Adam is here to check out the new Alienware AW720H headset to see if gamers should check these out or just play their games without audio.  Buy HyperX Cloud Alpha S Headphones:  Buy SteelSeries Arctis 5 Headphones:  Buy Logitech G PRO X Headphones:  Buy an Audio-Technica ATH-M50xSTS-USB Headset:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Alienware is getting around 0:27 Checking out the box 1:47 What's in the box? 2:39 Headset controls and build quality 6:10 Sponsor - Grammarly 6:52 Plugging it in 7:15 Mic test 7:42 Listening to music and Labs' results 9:38 Adam's gamer software rant 12:39 Dolby Audio compatibility   13:10 Audio latency test - Melatonin 13:37 Dolby Audio testing - Cyberpunk 2077 14:50 Pricing and overall thoughts 15:35 Outro
